argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dvelimf.1 | |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) |
| 2 |  | dvelimf.2 | |- ( ps -> A. z ps ) |
| 3 |  | dvelimf.3 | |- ( z = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_hbsb4 | |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( [ y / z ] ph -> A. x [ y / z ] ph ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 3 | #P_sbieh | |- ( [ y / z ] ph <-> ps ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_albii | |- ( A. x [ y / z ] ph <-> A. x ps ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_3imtr3g | |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( ps -> A. x ps ) ) |
\
 Version of ~ dvelim without any variable restrictions.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Oct-2002.)
